dict.string:
Open Redmine Project Page Workflow
This workflow enable quick access to redmine project pages. It uses Redmine API with an API key.
To be able to use the workflow, you need to : - enable Redmine API on your redmine server - generate your redmine api key from /my/account - use the red-config command to configure your redmine servers settings
version 1.2.0
New with version 1.2.0, : - configuration has moved from the workflow script filter to the file ./config/settings.json - you can now choose which wiki page to open
New with version 1.1.0, you can now open : - a project homepage - a project wiki homepage - a project issues homepage - an issue page
